page.title: 19The Domesday Project.
page.content: Our Project started off with the class looking at a map in the classroom. Sir wrote off to the{Domesday Project}and was given a twelve Kilometre area. The class had a meeting to discuss what groups we should have. We had a{ {Committee Meeting}with the parents. The parents decided if they would like to take part in the{Project.}A form went out telling about the groups and which parents were in it and the teachers and children. Each group held a meeting every week. The parents would organize the next visit. We visited a lot of places in our own time as well as the school's time. We decided to have an Exhibition to raise some money for the{R.S.P.C.A.} After a lot of{preparation}we are placing the{data}on to{a floppy disk.
